Articles.Content:
Hey guys! My channel got partnered recently and were on target to reach 100 subs, so to celebrate I thought I would come and promote my channel to the masses here (as KSP is my biggest earner 8))

At the moment there are only 5 videos on the playlist, but this week I\'m in the process of recording a whole mess of them to upload over a set period of time.

This will include trips to the Mun, Minmus, putting up a space station and Munolith hunting, to give you a little teaser check this out:

http://youtu.be/RbzOsajXaKQ?hd=1

You can find the playlist here:

http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4897AB4A235A1966&feature=plcp

Make sure you hit that subscribe button to stay ahead of the game and be the first to know when the new vids come out

until next time, peace!
i just subed to you i have a youtube channale how do i parterne?
just keep uploading stuff, its what I did and youtube just offered it to me
ok thanks also know any good editers

I subbed to you. Looking forward to more stuff from you.

ok thanks also know any good editers

Some people just use Windows Movie Maker because it comes with a PC (Unless you have a Mac then iMovie).

I would say Sony Vegas Pro 10 but it is a lot to pay for and I wouldn\'t really want to promote piracy on an indie game forum.

yeah windows movie maker has done well for me so far, there is the vegas option buts its mega expensive :\'( although im not surprised the with the awsome stuff it can do.

also glad you liked the intro
